title: PM Modi Was Not ‘Laughing’ Post Pulwama. It’s An Old Picture!
subtitle: CPI(ML) polit bureau member Kavita Krishnan on Sunday, 17 February, shared a photo of PM Modi along with Bihar CM Nitish Kumar, in which the duo are seen laughing.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
CPI(ML) polit bureau member Kavita Krishnan on Sunday, 17 February, shared a photo of Prime Minister Narendra Modi along with Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar, in which the duo are seen laughing.

Krishnan had re-tweeted another user’s post that claimed:

"After the Pulwala incident, the entire nation is in tears. But Modi and his friends like Nitish ji and Sakshi Maharaj are smiling, holding election campaigns With Sakshi Maharaj using a funeral procession as a campaign. But who will question them? Everybody is busy targeting Kashmiri students and traders (sic)." (Translated)
